devdoc.author: Fatima Castiglione Maldonado <castiglionemaldonado@gmail.com>
devdoc.details: The Service Registry contract has an array of token address, and provides of service providers for tokens, this simplifies the creation of an ecosystems of service providers.

addCategory(bytes32,string).details: This method is only callable by the contract's owner

params._description: Description of the new service category
params._name: Name of the new service category

params._service: Address of the service to use

getIdentityRegistryAddress().return: The address of the IdentityRegistry contract

getOwnerEIN().details: This contracts allows you to set ownership based on EIN instead of address

isOwner().details: This works on EINs, not on addresses
isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract

renounceOwnership().details: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner modifier anymore.

replaceService(bytes32,address,address).details: This method is only callable by the contract's owner

params._newService: New address for the service to use

params._identityRegistryAddress: The address of the IdentityRegistry contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferOwnership(uint256).details: This works on EINs, not on addresses

devdoc.title: HSTServiceRegistry

getIdentityRegistryAddress().notice: Get the address for the Identity Registry

getOwnerEIN().notice: Get EIN of the current owner

renounceOwnership().notice: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract

replaceService(bytes32,address,address).notice: Replaces the address pointer to a service for a new address

setIdentityRegistryAddress(address).notice: Set the address for the Identity Registry

transferOwnership(uint256).notice: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner

userdoc.notice: A service registry to hold adresses of service contracts for each security token
